result.execSummary:
The defendant Dakota J Hasz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Cash bond on file is applied to financial obligation owed - PAID IN FULL
.
.

records.addlTxt: Check# 37658 to DEF

State by Suleski /  Def w/o Atty
Suleski:  this is Plea - there was offer given, I believe def has accepted it.  Def has underlying case he is on Diversion Agreemt - that has been extended & looks like he is doing well...
Def;  correct
Plea Quest & Waiver filed
Waiver of Right to Atty filed - signed by def
CRT accepts Waiver - will proceed
Ct 3 - def pleads GUILTY
CRT finds def's plea is FVI made - sufficient factual basis exists - finds def guilty
Remaining Cts are Dismissed & read-in
State has complied w/ victim notification
Def:  Diversion Agreement on other case closed - I completed everything
Suleski - agrees, closed on 5-9-16
CRT'S SENTENCE:  2 days CJ w/ credit for 2 days - TIME SERVED;  Def to pay $100 Dom Abuse srchge & CRT costs/fees totalling $543 - can have pymt plan of $50 per month w/first pymt due 7-15-16 & each subsequent payment will be due 15th of every month thereafter;  Fail to pay is 1 day CJ for each $50 owed
Plea/SEH:  6-14-16 @ 11am - Send Notices
Plea/sentencing hearing on June 14, 2016 at 11:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Dakota J Hasz
Current: 2604 Marigold Rd, Wausau, WI 54401 United States  (Effective: 04-14-2016)
Prior: 800 West Ave N, Lot 121, West Salem, WI 54669 United States

State by Suleski /  Def w/o Atty
CRT:  set for Ples/SEH, is that what you intend today?
Def:  NO
Suleski: def is on 2014 Diversion, there was discussion if it was going to be revoked or extended.  That has affected this case & negotiations.  Ms. Hickey has extended that Diversion...if we could give him more time to hire atty...
Def:  that case s/b closed now, I paid it & Ms. Hickey was going to schedule something.  I can't get PD, can't afford atty...feel I did nothing wrong
CRT:  can he come in any Fri for pretrial?
Suleski:  any Fri. - yes
CRT:  def to go to DA's office any Friday before Status, which will be 5-26-16 @ 10am w/ GLD
CRT:  you can set this for trial since you feel you did nothing wrong...you can sit down w/ DA's office & see what their offer would be to resolve these charges
Def:  they want me to plea to DC...
CRT gives def definition of DC - you need to take care of this 
Def doesn't live in LAX anymore
CRT:  you should keep your address up to date w/ COC & DA's office so they can contact you
Def:  can this be transferred?
CRT:  this is LAX Co - it cannot be transferred
Def;s new address given
Petition is Denied per GLD - Not indigent
